start_boss.text: IT'S TIME TO MAKE A [Very Specil] DEAL!

retreat.text: THAT'S NOT VERY [Big Shot] OF YOU [Captain]!

engaged.text: WE'LL TURN THOSE [Schmoes] AND [Daves] INTO [Rosen Graves]

pursuing.text: DON'T YOU WANT TO BE A [Big Shot]?!

hull_90.text: [Limited time deal!] on [cleaning up] [your wellbeing is paramount!]
WAS THAT A [Big Shot!] JUST NOW?!

hull_50.text: [Esteemed customer] I see you are trying to deplete my [Hull points]!
IT'S TIME FOR A LITTLE [Bluegiant Specil]!

hull_30.text: HERE I GO!!! WATCH ME FLY [MAMA]!!!

victory.text: NOW THAT'S WHAT I'M TALKING AB04T!
